Please always provide the [GitHub issue(s)](../issues) your PR is for, as well as test URLs where your change can be observed (before and after):

Fix #<gh-issue-id>

Test URLs:
- Before: https://main--an-aem-next--anilvishwakarma-st.aem.live/
- After: https://<branch>--an-aem-next--anilvishwakarma-st.aem.live/
